instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3330-B no audio
threads.message: Hi, 820-3320-B with no audio on speakers or earphones. Prohibition symbol on audio when trying to change volume. Mic isn't working either. No signs of water damage. No chime.

threads.title: 820-3330-B no audio
threads.message:
Any history available?
Is the audio codec recognized in System Report?

threads.title: 820-3330-B no audio
threads.message:
Check all power rails of U6201.
Start checking U6200 output.

threads.title: 820-3330-B no audio
threads.message: Done, U6200 was ripped from its pads. Thank you very much.
